author: fakesmile
description: A fun word puzzle game cog for your redbot. Try your best to guess the words as they jumbled all the characters within the word
install_msg: Thanks for installing Wordgame cog. Do `[p]help WordGame` for more information.
short: Have a fun word game with your friends in your server.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
